source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Backgrounds for Abstracts
items.headline: Experimenting with painting materials
objectives_summary: Be able to use new techniques for their backgrounds
Be able to experiment with painting materials
Be able to use the new techniques and adapt them to their own needs

items.title: Knitting 101 | Beginners Guide to Knitting
items.headline: Learn Knitting from Beginner to Confident with this Knitting 101 Course. Beginners Guide to Knitting.
objectives_summary: How to Knit from beginner basics all the way up to advanced knitting.
Learn to do the Knit stitch, the Purl stitch, how to KFB, K2tog and much more.
They will Learn to knit in the round

items.title: A Doll Story - Mixed Media Art Doll Making with Danita
items.headline: Learn how I create my art dolls from scratch, starting with a pattern, some fabric, thread, paint and lots of love.
objectives_summary: I will teach you how to create an art ill like mine from scratch, starting just with fabric and fill, we will create an amazing doll with a story. Your own doll story.

items.title: Essential Drawing
items.headline: The information you need to get better at drawing.
objectives_summary: Draw realistically from observation. These skills are applicable in illustration, design and artmaking.

items.title: Fundamentals of Tapestry Crochet for Colorful Art
items.headline: Learn the power of Tapestry Crochet to add multiple colors to your project and crochet crisp lines.
objectives_summary: start a crochet piece with the foundation stitch
crochet using the Forward Single Stitch
crochet backwards from left to right so that the single crochet stitch is consistent on both sides (Backward Single Crochet Stitch)

items.title: Learn to Draw 21 Business Scenarios (Visual Thinking)

visible_instructors.name: Curious
visible_instructors.title: Curious Piyuesh
visible_instructors.job_title: Visual Storytelling Traine, Flip chart Storyboard Coach

items.headline: DRAW and Communicate Visually these 21 very common business scenarios
objectives_summary: Students will learn to draw common business scenarios and use these drawings during presentations, process management and training.
1 Drawing "Motivated team and Resistive team"
2 Drawing "Scrum masters and Project managers"

items.title: The Ultimate guide to Persian Calligraphy, Nastaliq Sript
items.headline: A Beginner's Guide To Persian Calligraphy From Scratch up-to Creating Stunning Persian Calligraphic Artwork
objectives_summary: You will be able to script and create your own Farsi Calligraphic artworks in Nastaliq Script, from a small to moderate sized wall hangings.
Designers will be able to create their own digital calligraphic artworks to sell on Stock Image websites.
You will learn how to prepare ink and bamboo

items.title: Drawing Fundamentals 3: Basics of Realistic Shading
items.headline: Learn shading & rendering techniques that will allow you to create dynamic drawings, paintings, or illustrations!
objectives_summary: Understand how light works and use this knowledge to create realistic drawings
The most common shading mistakes beginners make and how to avoid them
How to use hard and soft edges to make your drawings more three-dimensional even without using any shading

items.title: Bookbinding: Make a Perfect Bound Book
items.headline: Learn how to get started in bookbinding by crafting a handmade Perfect Bound book.
objectives_summary: Create a one of a kind perfect bound book.
Boost craftsmanship quality and skill.
Gain an understanding of general bookbinding technique.

items.title: Acrylic Painting for Beginners Landscape Techniques Course

visible_instructors.name: Rod
visible_instructors.title: Rod Moore
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Artist & Art Teacher

items.headline: Paint an Impressionist Landscape in Acrylic Painting for Beginners Course Step By Step Techniques
objectives_summary: Paint Great Looking Impressionistic Landscapes
Paint Dramatic Looking Panoramic Landscapes
Use Acrylic Paints With Confidence

items.title: Learn fiberglass-silicon molds and sculpture

visible_instructors.name: Francesca
visible_instructors.title: Francesca Dalla Benetta
visible_instructors.job_title: Escultora, Artista Plastica y Caracterizadora (Makeup FX)

items.headline: Learn how to make perfect copies of your original molds with traditional technique. Hollow copies. Suitable for Bronzes
objectives_summary: Make hollow pieces of resin and fiberglass (for example lamps)
Create a rigid and durable piece of resin
Make a mold of silicon rubber and fiberglass

items.title: Manga Drawing Basic Course / Panel Layout

visible_instructors.name: MANABI
visible_instructors.title: MANABI JOURNEY
visible_instructors.job_title: Education biz / 教材開発・出版事業

items.headline: Let's master panel layout (roles and types of panels) that is the basis of drawing manga. [English Subtitles]
objectives_summary: You can learn Japanese Manga drawing skills and draw it.
You can obtain basic skills and post your manga on manga posting site.
We focus on that you can draw manga rapidly, not become a professional manga artist.

items.title: How To Color Comics - Digital Techniques

visible_instructors.name: Ed
visible_instructors.title: Ed Foychuk
visible_instructors.job_title: Illustrator and Instructor at How To Draw Comics . net

items.headline: Digital Techniques
objectives_summary: Learn how to approach lighting a piece
learn how to flat color
learn basic cell shading

items.title: Embracing Imperfection: Create Your Own Expressive Artwork

visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor

items.headline: Develop the right approach, attitude and techniques for painting expressive artwork.
objectives_summary: Learn to break away from unnecessary details that only clutter your artwork.
Develop the mindset and skills that will allow you to paint more expressively.
Learn why so many artists can paint loosely with ease and what's stopping you from achieving expressive art.

items.title: Watercolor painting | Paint With Me | Freedom and Expression

visible_instructors.name: Arie
visible_instructors.title: Arie Swanepoel
visible_instructors.job_title: I am a Watercolorist and Art Instructor.

items.headline: I believe this course will assist many watercolorist too paint expressive and loose.
objectives_summary: How to do a simple line drawing to start your painting process.
Choose the proper painting supplies for a loose painting technique. Choosing the right materials can make a big difference in how loose your painting turns out. You will learn
Express freedom in painting by developing the right mindset. If you’re feeling tense, it will come through in your work, often resulting in a fussy, overdone painting.

items.title: Cold Process Beginner Soapmaking
items.headline: Learn to create soap from scratch with confidence using the cold process method
objectives_summary: Learn basic cold process soapmaking
Learn everything to make your first batch of soap
Learn about the saponification process
